tooltipContent.title: Total Revenue
tooltipContent.text: Gross income from all sales before deductions. Key indicator of overall financial performance and growth.

tooltipContent.title: Average Order Value
tooltipContent.text: Average amount spent per order. Calculated by dividing total revenue by number of orders. Helps understand customer spending and marketing effectiveness.

tooltipContent.title: Inventory Turnover
tooltipContent.text: Measures how quickly stock is sold and replaced. Indicates inventory management efficiency. Higher turnover suggests better sales, lower might indicate overstocking.
